Create a personalized learning plan for yourself based on your strengths and weaknesses, and stick to it consistently.
Find a study group or accountability partner who can provide support and encouragement during your learning journey.
Try different learning techniques such as visual aids, hands-on activities, or memory games to make the material more engaging and memorable.
Take breaks and engage in activities that help you relax and recharge to avoid burnout and maintain focus.
Set realistic goals and celebrate your achievements along the way to build confidence and motivation.
